members.name: Umbrella Man
powers: Creates magical umbrellas that disappear when rain stops.
Remains hidden due to shyness, and surprises unsuspecting people caught in rain storms with umbrella devices that don't need carrying.

members.name: Zucchini Thumper
powers: Mastered the art of zucchini bat thumping

members.name: Aluminum Spinner
powers: Can extract aluminum and control it's structure.
Favorite use became spinning aluminum cans around crooks and leaving oversized cans for the police to open.
